Find links

Source: R/functions.R
pipe_find_links.Rd

Find links

pipe_find_links(graf, field = NULL, value, operator = NULL)

Examples

pipe_find_links(cashTransferMap,value="Cash")

#> # A tbl_graph: 127 nodes and 0 edges
#> #
#> # A rooted forest with 127 trees
#> #
#> # Node Data: 127 x 3 (active)
#>      id label                                     factor_note
#>   <int> <chr>                                     <chr>      
#> 1     1 (RW) Birth                                NA         
#> 2     2 (HN) WASH Information [E]                 NA         
#> 3     3 (HN) Malaria prevention advice [E]        NA         
#> 4     4 (BF) Agricultural training and advice [E] NA         
#> 5     5 (IEA) Social Cash Transfer (OrgX) [E]     NA         
#> 6     6 (IEA) Social Cash Transfer (Gov) [I]      NA         
#> # ... with 121 more rows
#> #
#> # Edge Data: 0 x 19
#> # ... with 19 variables: from <int>, to <int>, statement_id <int>, quote <chr>,
#> #   note <chr>, label <chr>, attribution <chr>, definition <chr>,
#> #   project_attribution <chr>, valence_attribution <chr>, strength <dbl>,
#> #   neg_from <int>, neg_to <int>, hashtags <chr>, id <int>,
#> #   actualisation <dbl>, certainty <dbl>, weight <dbl>, found <lgl>
pipe_find_links(cashTransferMap,field="label",value="Cash",operator="contains")

#> # ... with 121 more rows
#> #
#> # Edge Data: 0 x 19
#> # ... with 19 variables: from <int>, to <int>, statement_id <int>, quote <chr>,
#> #   note <chr>, label <chr>, attribution <chr>, definition <chr>,

#> #   neg_from <int>, neg_to <int>, hashtags <chr>, id <int>,

pipe_find_links(cashTransferMap,field="from",value="12",operator="greater")
